name: @repo/e2e
description: WebdriverIO Electron Service E2E Test Suite

scripts.init-e2es: pnpm dlx shx mkdir -p ./test/js && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.test:e2e:forge-cjs: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=forge-cjs pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:forge-esm: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=forge-esm pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:builder-cjs: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=builder-cjs pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:builder-esm: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=builder-esm pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e-mac-universal:forge-cjs: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=forge-cjs pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e-mac-universal:forge-esm: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=forge-esm pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e-mac-universal:builder-cjs: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=builder-cjs pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e-mac-universal:builder-esm: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=builder-esm pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:no-binary-cjs: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=no-binary-cjs pnpm run exec-no-binary
scripts.test:e2e:no-binary-esm: cross-env DEBUG=wdio-electron-service EXAMPLE_DIR=no-binary-esm pnpm run exec-no-binary
scripts.exec: pnpm run exec:js && pnpm run exec:main && pnpm run exec:multiremote && pnpm run exec:standalone && pnpm run exec:window
scripts.exec-no-binary: pnpm run exec-no-binary:js && pnpm run exec-no-binary:main && pnpm run exec-no-binary:multiremote && pnpm run exec-no-binary:standalone && pnpm run exec-no-binary:window
scripts.exec-no-binary:window: cross-env ENABLE_SPLASH_WINDOW=true pnpm run exec-no-binary:main && pnpm run exec-no-binary:multiremote
scripts.exec:window: cross-env ENABLE_SPLASH_WINDOW=true pnpm run exec:main && pnpm run exec:multiremote
scripts.exec:standalone:local: cd .. && pnpm build && cd - && shx rm -rf ./node_modules && pnpm i && pnpm test:standalone
